languages.text: {n}Клеменциа кланяется вам.{/n} "С возвращением, Ваша Светлость! Я рада, что ваш путь вновь привел вас в родные стены, ибо у меня есть для вас приятнейшее известие. Ваши подданные подали прошение о передаче вам скромной награды от лица народа".

traits.locale_text: {n}Клеменциа кланяется вам.{/n} "С возвращением, Ваша Светлость! Я рада, что ваш путь вновь привел вас в родные стены, ибо у меня есть для вас приятнейшее известие. Ваши подданные подали прошение о передаче вам скромной награды от лица народа".

languages.text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа кланяется вам.{/n} "С возвращением, Ваша Светлость! Я рада, что ваш путь вновь привел вас в родные стены, ибо у меня есть для вас приятнейшее известие. Ваши подданные подали прошение о передаче вам скромной награды от лица народа".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you to your home again, for I have a wonderful news for you. Your subjects filed a request for granting you a modest reward from the people."

{n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you to your home again, for I have a wonderful news for you. Your subjects filed a request for granting you a modest reward from the people."

{n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have wonderful news for you. Your subjects have filed a request to present you with a modest reward from the people."

{n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have wonderful news for you. Your subjects have filed a request to present you with a modest reward from the people."

{n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“欢迎回来，大人！我很高兴您再次踏上归途，因为我有个好消息要告诉您。您的臣民已经向您提出申请，希望能将他们精心准备好的微薄之礼献给您。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“欢迎回来，大人！我很高兴您再次踏上归途，因为我有个好消息要告诉您。您的臣民已经向您提出申请，希望能将他们精心准备好的微薄之礼献给您。”

languages.text: {n}Clémentia s'incline devant vous.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous revoir, Votre Seigneurie ! Vous arrivez à point nommé, car j'ai une merveilleuse nouvelle à vous annoncer. Vos sujets ont souhaité vous remettre une modeste récompense de la part du peuple tout entier. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clémentia s'incline devant vous.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous revoir, Votre Seigneurie ! Vous arrivez à point nommé, car j'ai une merveilleuse nouvelle à vous annoncer. Vos sujets ont souhaité vous remettre une modeste récompense de la part du peuple tout entier. »

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアが礼をする。{/n}「おかえりなさいませ、陛下！ご無事にお戻りになったことを嬉しく思います。ところで、陛下に素晴らしいお知らせがあるのです。臣下の者たちが、民からのささやかな贈り物を陛下にお納めしたいと願い出ております」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアが礼をする。{/n}「おかえりなさいませ、陛下！ご無事にお戻りになったことを嬉しく思います。ところで、陛下に素晴らしいお知らせがあるのです。臣下の者たちが、民からのささやかな贈り物を陛下にお納めしたいと願い出ております」

languages.text: {n}Clementia te hace una reverencia.{/n} «¡Bienvenid{mf|o|a} una vez más, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Me alegro de que su camino vuelva a traerle a casa, porque tengo noticias maravillosas. Sus súbditos han presentado una petición para poder entregarle una humilde ofrenda en nombre del pueblo».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia te hace una reverencia.{/n} «¡Bienvenid{mf|o|a} una vez más, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Me alegro de que su camino vuelva a traerle a casa, porque tengo noticias maravillosas. Sus súbditos han presentado una petición para poder entregarle una humilde ofrenda en nombre del pueblo».

languages.text: {n}Clementia verneigt sich vor dir.{/n} "Willkommen zurück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich bin froh, dass Euer Pfad Euch wieder nach Hause geführt hat, denn ich habe grandiose Neuigkeiten für Euch. Eure Untertanen haben darum gebeten, Euch ein bescheidenes Geschenk des Volkes überreichen zu dürfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia verneigt sich vor dir.{/n} "Willkommen zurück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich bin froh, dass Euer Pfad Euch wieder nach Hause geführt hat, denn ich habe grandiose Neuigkeiten für Euch. Eure Untertanen haben darum gebeten, Euch ein bescheidenes Geschenk des Volkes überreichen zu dürfen."

{n}Clementia verneigt sich vor dir.{/n} "Willkommen zurück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich bin froh, dass Euer Pfad Euch wieder nach Hause geführt hat, denn ich habe wunderbare Neuigkeiten für Euch. Eure Untertanen haben darum gebeten, Euch eine bescheidene Belohnung des Volkes überreichen zu dürfen."

languages.text: {n}Clementia önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Hoş geldiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yolunuzun sizi tekrar evinize ulaştırması beni pek mutlu etti. Size harika haberlerim var. Tebaanız, size naçizane bir adak takdim etme talebinde bulundu."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia bows to you.{/n} "Welcome back, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I am glad that your path has led you home again, for I have splendid news for you. Your subjects have requested to present you with a humble offering from the people."
